column4: Will an update from 10.10 to 11.04 help a screwed python setup? I don't think I am ready for all the GUI Snazz of 11.04 quite yet, and stick to the classic GUI Now
natty has the option of classic desktop
What is the difference performance wise? I have a 6 six year old rig I won't be able to upgrade too soon
largely the same, I am not aware of your hardware or setup so could not say for sure
